title: Econometric Modeling
description: This course introduces techniques on economic and business forecasting, focusing on regression analysis and ARIMA models.  Testing for unit roots and cointegration are also discussed.  Professional software packages for forecasting are used in applications.

prerequisites: ECON 6160 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
